name: LayerZero Bridged USDC (re.al)
description: USDC (USD Coin) is a digital stablecoin, fully backed by US dollars held in reserve by regulated financial institutions, maintaining a 1:1 value with the USD. The bridged version of USDC on the re.al chain enables secure, fast, and efficient cross-chain transactions. It combines the reliability of a stable asset with the flexibility and scalability of decentralized blockchain ecosystems, supporting interoperability across different networks. USDC's transparency, with regular audits, ensures trust for users and institutions alike.
